title: IC3 : total damage caused by reported cyber crime 2001 to 2018
yAxis: Total damage in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total damage in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 17 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 2011 to 2004.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2004 to 2001.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
gold: The statistic shows the amount of damages caused by cyber crime reported to the IC3 from 2001 to 2018 . In the last reported period , the annual loss of complaints referred to the IC3 amounted to 2.71 billion U.S. dollars , up from 1 billion U.S. dollars in 2015 .
